unnormalised: Arre yaar, last month's electricity bill was a shocker! ₹5,500, can you believe it? And then there's the JioFiber bill, ₹999 per month, always consistent at least. Pani ka bill also came, another ₹800. Itna kharcha! Need to seriously cut down on AC usage; otherwise, next month might cross ₹7,000 just for electricity. Sigh, Delhi heat is expensive!
normalised: Oh man, last month's electricity bill was a shocker! Rupee five thousand five hundred, can you believe it? And then there's the JioFiber bill, rupee nine hundred and ninety nine per month, always consistent at least. Water bill also came, another rupee eight hundred. So much expense! Need to seriously cut down on A-C usage; otherwise, next month might cross rupee seven thousand just for electricity. Sigh, Delhi heat is expensive!
